<<<<<<< HEAD
A publick and pious design for the preserving the generous youth, and consequently the nation from rvine. Panton, Edward.
[2], 6 p.
printed for the author, London : 1676.
"To the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, the humble petition of Edward Panton ..": p. 3. Concerns the establishment of a Royal Academy for the education and training of youth in England. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
